About.Hours & facilities:
Thursday to Sunday 11am to 4pm or at other times by appointment.
Research assistance available upon request and advance notice of 1 week of visit is advisable. Proof of identity required. Copying services available upon request for photographs, books and journals. No borrowing permitted.

About.Access: Minimum age 18 years. 2 weeks' advance notice of visit required including details of nature of enquiry. Proof of identity required.

About.Acquisition focus: Formed in 1957, Camden Historical Society is instrumental in keeping history alive in the Camden district through the Camden Museum and is responsible for the preservation and display of this heritage. The collection of research material includes photographs and private papers relating to both current and historical events.
